#summary Lambda Calculus Project

= Introduction =

Lambda Calculus Parser, Interpreter, and Library.

= Details =

Untyped, normal redex, Lambda Calculus.

Provides:

 * zero
 * one
 * two
 * three
 * four
 * five
 * six
 * seven
 * eight
 * nine
 * inc
 * plus
 * times
 * dec
 * true
 * false
 * fix
 * ifThenElse
 * isZero
 * mult
 * factorial
